Koch Industries, Inc. All rights reserved.

You strive to live life to its fullest. Our products are here to help. From the walls of your home to the napkins on your table, the boxes at your local grocery store and restroom dispensers when you travel, chances are you benefit from our products throughout your day.

Making Life's Simple Necessities®

Based in Atlanta, Georgia, our 35,000 employees in our 200+ locations are always looking for better ways to create things that benefit individuals and society in environmentally responsible ways. Find a brief company history and links to all our products here.

Featured Brands

The strength to take on tough messes® brawny.com

From cups to plates and bowls, Dixie® is the perfect solution to help you focus on what matters most – not the dishes. dixie.com

From plywood and wallboard to lumber and chemicals, our products help you build with confidence. buildgp.com

For hygienic, touch-free, one-at-a-time towel dispensing, wave hello to enMotion®.

Designed with the perfect softness and lasting strength you need, at a price that won't break the bank. angelsoft.com

Clean Hands. Healthy Kids.

The Green Hand® Project

As part of our efforts to help the communities in which we do business, GP Cellulose is working to help UNICEF provide safe and healthy schools for thousands of children in China.

Stephanie, a scientist at Georgia-Pacific's Innovation Institute® in Neenah, Wisconsin, is inspired by infinite possibilities.

Georgia-Pacific

Food. Shelter. Clothing. Transportation. Koch Industries creates life’s basic necessities, while innovating ways to make them even better. Yet our advocacy for a free and open society is what truly sets us apart.
